policies.inbound:
<validate-jwt token-value="@( (String) context.Request.Body.As(preserveContent: true)["bearer"])" failed-validation-httpcode="401" failed-validation-error-message="Unauthorized. Access token is missing or invalid.">
      
      
        
          apim.request.admin
          api.publisher.user
          api.publisher.admin
        
      
    
    
      
        *
      
      
        GET
        POST
      
    
    
      <when condition="@(context.Request.Body.As(preserveContent: true)["otp"] == null)">
        
          
          @{
            return new JObject(
              new JProperty("message", "OTP must be present in the request body.")
            ).ToString();
          }
        
      
      <when condition="@(string.IsNullOrEmpty(context.Request.Body.As(preserveContent: true)["otp"].Value()))">
        
          
          @{
            return new JObject(
            new JProperty("message", "OTP value must not be empty.")
            ).ToString();
            }
        
      
    
    
    @{
      return new JObject(
        new JProperty("otp", (String) context.Request.Body.As(preserveContent: true)["otp"]),
        new JProperty("email", (String) context.Request.Body.As(preserveContent: true)["email"])
      ).ToString();
    }
